text: Hector the Bulldog is an animated cartoon character in Warner Bros. Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies series of cartoons. Hector is a muscular bulldog and walks pigeon-toed. He often wears a black collar with silver studs. Hector first appeared in Peck up Your Troubles (1945). In this movie, he stops Sylvester the Cat from getting a woodpecker. In A Hare Grows in Manhattan, he leads a street gang of dogs. However, his usual role is protecting Tweety Bird from Sylvester and other danger. Granny is the owner of Hector. Hector is a beige and brown dog. When Granny is away or not protecting Tweety Bird from Sylvester the Cat, Hector will step in and protect Tweety. The bulldog will often risk his own life to help Tweety Bird. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1945 Category:Fictional dogs Category:Looney Tunes characters
title: Hector the Bulldog
